title: New all-time low prices on Apple Watch for Black Friday
description: Apple Watch Black Friday deals are live, with new all-time lowest prices on Apple Watch Ultra, SE and Series 10. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Leander Kahney
excerpt: Apple Watch Black Friday deals are live, with new all-time lowest prices on Apple Watch Ultra, SE and Series 10.
text: Daily deals The Apple Watch Ultra 2 in the new Black Titanium finish is available at its lowest ever price for Black Friday. Photo: Apple Apple Watch Black Friday deals are live, featuring some significant price drops on both the most- and least-affordable Apple Watches. The best deal is the entry-level Apple Watch SE 2 from just $169 (save $80). This is a great price for a great watch that boasts almost all the same features as its pricier siblings. It’s a great starter watch and perfect for kids (and you can track them with it). Meanwhile, the latest high-end Apple Watch Ultra 2 in sleek Black Titanium is also $80 off. Not to be left out, the brand-new Apple Watch Series 10 with its big beautiful screen is available at its best price to date on Amazon, starting at just $329.This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items. An Apple Watch is an awesome gift, and the entry-level SE models are surprisingly affordable starting at just $169 right now. The SE models are being discounted by Amazon only so far, and are priced at $80 off — a pretty good chunk of change. At the other end of the spectrum, the brand new Apple Watch Ultra 2 in Black Titanium is Apple’s most capable smart watch, but also the priciest. It rarely sees a discount, but right now it’s on sale for $719, which is $80 off. The natural titanium model is also on sale at Amazon for even less: It’s priced at $699, a saving of $99. Not to be left out, the brand new Series 10, which features the biggest screen yet in an Apple Watch, is also seeing discounts of up to $70. See below for more details. Apple Watch SE Apple Watch SE2 is entry-level, yet it still does a lot.Photo: Apple Apple’s 40mm Apple Watch SE (GPS) is available at a new all-time low price on Amazon, at just $169.00 (regularly $249.00). The deal is available in all three aluminum colors (Starlight, Midnight and Silver). At present, only Amazon appears to have this $80 discount. The larger 44mm Apple Watch SE (GPS) is also priced at another all-time low, with $80 off. It’s available for 199.00 on Amazon (regularly $279.00). Apple Watch SE (40mm/GPS): $169 (save $80) Apple Watch SE (44mm/GPS): $199 (save 80) Apple Watch Ultra 2 The Apple Watch Ultra 2 in Black Titanium is so hot.Image: Apple In keeping with the Black Friday trend of record-low prices, Amazon now has the Black Titanium Apple Watch Ultra 2 on sale for $719 (regularly $799.00). This is the all-time lowest price we’ve been able to find, and again, it appears only Amazon has this deal at the moment. The natural titanium model is also on sale for even less: $699.99 (regularly $799). Apple Watch Ultra 2 (Black Titanium): $719 (save $80) Apple Watch Ultra 2 (Titanium): $699.99 (save $99) Black Friday deals on Apple Watch Series 10 That glossy Jet Black color is new to the Apple Watch 10 aluminum cases this year.Photo: Apple Black Friday deals on Apple Watch Series 10 see the hot wearable starting at a new Amazon all-time low of $329 (regularly $399) — a good $20 lower than previous Amazon discounts. All three colors of the smaller 42mm Apple Watch Series 10 are discounted to $329. The larger 46mm models are also on sale starting at $359.99 (regularly $429). Apple Watch Series 10 (42mm/GPS): $329 (save $70) Apple Watch Series 10 (46mm/GPS): $359.99 (save $70)
html:
• Daily deals

Apple Watch Black Friday deals are live, featuring some significant price drops on both the most- and least-affordable Apple Watches.

The best deal is the entry-level Apple Watch SE 2 from just $169 (save $80). This is a great price for a great watch that boasts almost all the same features as its pricier siblings. It’s a great starter watch and perfect for kids (and you can track them with it). Meanwhile, the latest high-end Apple Watch Ultra 2 in sleek Black Titanium is also $80 off.

Not to be left out, the brand-new Apple Watch Series 10 with its big beautiful screen is available at its best price to date on Amazon, starting at just $329.

This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items.

An Apple Watch is an awesome gift, and the entry-level SE models are surprisingly affordable starting at just $169 right now. The SE models are being discounted by Amazon only so far, and are priced at $80 off — a pretty good chunk of change.

At the other end of the spectrum, the brand new Apple Watch Ultra 2 in Black Titanium is Apple’s most capable smart watch, but also the priciest. It rarely sees a discount, but right now it’s on sale for $719, which is $80 off. The natural titanium model is also on sale at Amazon for even less: It’s priced at $699, a saving of $99.

Not to be left out, the brand new Series 10, which features the biggest screen yet in an Apple Watch, is also seeing discounts of up to $70. See below for more details.

Apple Watch SE

Apple’s 40mm Apple Watch SE (GPS) is available at a new all-time low price on Amazon, at just $169.00 (regularly $249.00). The deal is available in all three aluminum colors (Starlight, Midnight and Silver). At present, only Amazon appears to have this $80 discount.

The larger 44mm Apple Watch SE (GPS) is also priced at another all-time low, with $80 off. It’s available for 199.00 on Amazon (regularly $279.00).

  • Apple Watch SE (40mm/GPS): $169 (save $80)
  • Apple Watch SE (44mm/GPS): $199 (save 80)

Apple Watch Ultra 2

In keeping with the Black Friday trend of record-low prices, Amazon now has the Black Titanium Apple Watch Ultra 2 on sale for $719 (regularly $799.00). This is the all-time lowest price we’ve been able to find, and again, it appears only Amazon has this deal at the moment. The natural titanium model is also on sale for even less: $699.99 (regularly $799).

  • Apple Watch Ultra 2 (Black Titanium): $719 (save $80)
  • Apple Watch Ultra 2 (Titanium): $699.99 (save $99)

Black Friday deals on Apple Watch Series 10

Black Friday deals on Apple Watch Series 10 see the hot wearable starting at a new Amazon all-time low of $329 (regularly $399) — a good $20 lower than previous Amazon discounts.

All three colors of the smaller 42mm Apple Watch Series 10 are discounted to $329. The larger 46mm models are also on sale starting at $359.99 (regularly $429).

  • Apple Watch Series 10 (42mm/GPS): $329 (save $70)
  • Apple Watch Series 10 (46mm/GPS): $359.99 (save $70)
